name: Toodles & Toddlers
storyline:
Toddlers can be friends, or food.  
  
The humongous clown-demon Toodles has escaped from his poorly constructed cage, so foolish villagers summon the mighty Player to protect them. They're gonna regret that.  
  
Gifted with the magical ability to throw stuff, the Player will use any resource available to defeat their bloated nemesis. Sacrifice villagers, transform and consume cute wildlife, do whatever it takes to survive until you have enough strength to bring down the clown.  
  
Balls will be your primary tools, and can be used to craft allies to fight for you. You will need to build an army before taking on Toodles. For starters, try different balls on the toddlers.  
  
This puzzle has many pieces that can be put together in different combinations. Experiment with transformations and through curiosity you can discover multiple strategies for victory.
summary: Toodles & Toddlers is a survival horror puzzle hybrid with physics transformation crafting and resource chains. Experiment to discover what is possible then use the tools you create to combat hostile creatures while coping with fear and hunger.
